abstract: A consumer watchdog group began an advertising campaign aimed at Google and its chief executive. It hopes to create a “Do Not Track Me” list for Web users.
snippet: A consumer watchdog group began an advertising campaign aimed at Google and its chief executive. It hopes to create a “Do Not Track Me” list for Web users.
lead_paragraph: Consumer Watchdog, a consumer group, has long been critical of Google and some of the comments that Eric Schmidt, the company’s chief executive, has made about privacy online.

headline.main: Consumer Watchdog Group Goes After Google

abstract: YouTube is expected to turn a profit this year, on revenue of about $450 million, with help from its onetime critics.
snippet: YouTube is expected to turn a profit this year, on revenue of about $450 million, with help from its onetime critics.
lead_paragraph: SAN BRUNO, Calif.  Last month, a YouTube user, TomR35, uploaded a clip from the AMC series “Mad Men” in which Don Draper makes a heartfelt speech about the importance of nostalgia in advertising.

headline.main: YouTube Ads Turn Videos Into Revenue
headline.print_headline: YouTube Ads Turn Videos Into Revenue
